Reference

Mosaics

Create a LEGO mosaic from an image

build_mosaic()

Display 2D LEGO mosaic as a plot image

image_to_mosaic()

Create a 2D LEGO mosaic from an image array

3D Models

Build 3D models from various inputs

bricks_from_coords()

Create a 3D model object from a long coordinate data frame

bricks_from_excel()

Convert an Excel 'brickr' template into a 3D object

bricks_from_mosaic()

Convert a 2D LEGO mosaic into a 'brickr' 3D object

bricks_from_table()

Convert a table into a 'brickr' 3D object

build_bricks()

Build 3D brick model with 'rgl'

Bricks IRL

Helper functions to create bricks and build them IRL.

build_colors()

Display available brick colors

build_instructions()

Create instruction manual for a 2D mosaic or 3D model

build_pieces()

Display bricks required to build model or mosaic

build_pieces_table()

Generate required bricks as a data frame
